title: It's up to you: fire protection
creator_contributor_role: United States. Dept. of Agriculture, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Outdoor education
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Fire prevention - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Outdoor recreation - Safety measures
description: Smokey Bear, a cartoon figure, makes a direct appeal to everyone to help in preventing forest fires. He explains how fires have caused in one year the loss of enough timber to supply the building needs of a large city. He shows a family picnic party carefully putting out their camp fire, while the father grinds his match and pipe ash into the ground.
